create table menu_category ( id bigint not null auto_increment, name varchar(50) not null, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table mission ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), deadline date, mission_spec varchar(50) not null, point integer, restaurant_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table region ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), name varchar(50) not null, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table restaurant ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), address varchar(50) not null, name varchar(50) not null, rating float(23), menu_id bigint, region_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table review ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), body varchar(256) not null, rating float(23), title varchar(30) not null, restaurant_id bigint, user_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table review_comment ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), body varchar(256) not null, review_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table review_image ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), image_url varchar(256) not null, review_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table term ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), body varchar(256) not null, optional bit, title varchar(20) not null, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table user ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), address varchar(50) not null, address_spec varchar(30) not null, birth date, email varchar(255), gender VARCHAR(10), image_url varchar(50) not null, inactive_date date, name varchar(20) not null, nickname varchar(20) not null, point integer default 0, status VARCHAR(15) DEFAULT 'ACTIVE', primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table user_agree ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), term_id bigint, user_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table user_mission ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), identification_number integer not null, is_success bit not null, mission_id bigint, user_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
create table user_prefer ( id bigint not null auto_increment, created_at datetime(6), updated_at datetime(6), category_id bigint, user_id bigint, primary key (id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate:
